title: Skynet Ain’t So Tough
author: VD
content_html:
Round One of the Human-Robot Wars goes to the humans.

“Coning” a driverless car forces some of them to have to be hard reset. It’s done as a form of protest against the autonomous vehicles.

Writers, be sure to add “a traffic cone” to the standard gear for your modern monster hunter.

DISCUSS ON SG
